review:
Dr. Manoj is not only a gifted physician but also a very compassionate, sensitive and understanding being.

He very patiently answered all of my questions in a very detailed comprehensive manner while at the same time relating my foot condition the practical areas of everyday life - so I will be able to find the balance between the limitations of my condition while at the same time dong those things that would be optimal to healing the condition.

Dr. Padman covered every possible scenario for my foot condition to include recommending a special customized shoe (boot) if needed. He also very graphically explained the anatomy of my condition so I could truly understand how to deal with it.

He treated me as if I was a close relative or a best friend. 

I also found his level of expertise to be beyond any quantified level because it became obvious to me that his professional knowledge of his field is simply without limits.

Lastly - I would enthusiastically recommend Dr. Manoj Padman as the one - and only one to see and consult with regarding any orthopaedic condition - especially if surgery is a consideration.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Experience was very good, I went for his opinion as I wanted best treatment for my daughter, and I must say this was by far the best opinion I have received by Dr Manoj, and after meeting him now I wont be meeting any other doctors for futher opinions, my search has ended here and now I am fully convinced on what line of action required for my daughter. Thank you Dr Manoj for your 40 minutes which you have spent explaining everything related to such problem and showing casestudies of past similar cases. I will now plan for the treatment under your supervision. Thank you.

We went to show our son, who has a difference in lengths of his legs. Dr. Manoj is very knowledgeable of his subject and did extremely  objective evaluation on the problem. He listened to us patiently and did not try to hurry things up. We are extremely cynical and curious by nature, but he answered all our doubts and queries without any irritation. He did not try to push us into any medicines or treatment. Neither did he insisted on any particular labs for the tests required. We would definitely recommend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I m frm kashmir ,birthed a baby with foot deformities n limb discrepancy..aftr consulting him i found an angel with blessed hands ...treating my baby for 3yrs n now he is no more disable..he has given a new shape to my babies body n life..i m always indebted to him..n pray for his well being everytime i pray..babies like mine need him the most...none is like him..!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
On 18 th July I had taken my 19th month old son to show to Dr. Manoj Padman (paediatric orthopaedic). My son had a complaint of bow shaped leg .On physical examination he had confirmed that child looks normal and to confirm if everything is fine he had suggested few X-rays which we got it done right at that time and showed him the films of the X-ray on which he reconfirmed that X-rays are also normal by the time he turns two and half he should start walking normal and the bow should finish. Me and my family were happy with the positive answer and as per his suggestion we did not start any medication.  On 28th July I went to collect the written report from the  hospital in which it was mentioned suggestive of Rickets. Looking at the written report I couldn’t stay calm and I started contacted the doctor on 29th July however their was no response from his side till 2nd August . After 4 days when I again called the doctor, his assistant is telling me that doctor is now saying that we need to run some test and need to see the child again and he agreed that he had overlooked the X-ray flims and now he is also suggesting that it could be rickets . I am writing this review for the other family and kids to please think 100 times before approaching this doctor *** **** ***** ** *** ******** ** **** ***** *** ** **** **** * ******** * If I would have not collected the written report of my son and would have gone through Dr Padman words ** **** ***** *** **** ***** **** **** ** ***** ***** ***** ** ***** I am attaching the reports and the prescription ***** ******* ***** *** ** ***** ********* ** *** **********
On 2nd of August I had reported this issue to rainbow hospital which in return had connected me to Dr. Shivani (medical director ). After explaining her the entire scenario I was expecting that she would help me in taking some action against the doctor . However in return she started favouring Dr. Padman. I had put all my effort to save other parents by not putting their child in hands of this doctor but I failed because rainbow hospital instead of supporting their patients *** ********* ***** ***** ****** * Dr. Shivani on each call had only insisted me to come to hospital and meet the doctor and resolve the issue, she didn’t had any other solution for my problem but to only mutually solve it by meeting the doctor. * ******* *** *** **** ** ******* ******** **** ******* ** **** ** ********* *** ******* ******** *** *** ******** *** **** ******* * * **** ***** ** ****** ****** ** ******** * ** *** ***** ***** ** ******* ******** **** *** **** ****** ********* ****** **** ***** ** ********** ******** *** ***** ** ********** ******** *** **** **** ****** ** ***** **** ** *** ***** *** ****** ***** ******** ***** ** ******** ***** 

So please to all people who are reading this review do not consider taking consultation from Dr. Manoj padman .******** ** ***** ** ** ***** ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Excellent doctor, but very arrogant support staff particularly dr. Varun , Dr. Varun does not values patient's time, kept our entire family waiting for a document required for insurance for more than 2 hours particularly during lunch hour Nd went for lunch kept us waiting without lunch including the patient (5 year old baby girl)

Doctor Manoj Padman has been a great adviser and counselor to us with respect to the treatment of our first born child master Shaurya Ghanghas since the year 2009. We regard him highly for his work. A qualified and professional doctor like him can be quite busy at times and thats acceptable. Thank you doctor for your invaluable guidance this time also (like always)..Regards, Vikas Ghanghas, Father of the child.

Dr. Manoj is very polite and good doctor...i took my 2.5 years old child as he was complaining about joints pain...*** ***** *** *** ********* *** ************ ************** *** ********.He just made the child walk and checked the joints of the legs...and told us that it's simply growing pain and there's nothing to worry about the same...He is honest and treat children with utmost love and care...I would truly say yes to such a doctor...

Doctor was genuine, took proper history and our inputs, gave his assessment and advice, did not recommend unnecessary procedures and explained his points well. He was knowledgeable and patient in his explanations. He gave us adequate time and did not rush us. I am happy with our experience.

Doctor is good, but Practo is not able book my appointment with the doctor. I have to meet doctor as walk-in patient. Moreover, fees shown on practo and what actually doctor charged is different. Practo showing less fees.

Dr. Manoj is not only a gifted physician but also a very compassionate, sensitive and understanding being.

He very patiently answered all of my questions in a very detailed comprehensive manner while at the same time relating my foot condition the practical areas of everyday life - so I will be able to find the balance between the limitations of my condition while at the same time dong those things that would be optimal to healing the condition.

Dr. Padman covered every possible scenario for my foot condition to include recommending a special customized shoe (boot) if needed. He also very graphically explained the anatomy of my condition so I could truly understand how to deal with it.

He treated me as if I was a close relative or a best friend. 

I also found his level of expertise to be beyond any quantified level because it became obvious to me that his professional knowledge of his field is simply without limits.

Lastly - I would enthusiastically recommend Dr. Manoj Padman as the one - and only one to see and consult with regarding any orthopaedic condition - especially if surgery is a consideration.

****** *** **** ************* *** calmed our anxiety and explained the issue. Guided us very well. We would surely recommend Dr Manoj for anyone facing same problem.
He was very helpful. He didn't ask us to for any unnecessary tests and advised few basic things to be taken care.
Good experience* ************* ********! Gave us plenty of time. Reception staff lovely. My kid also liked the doctor.
I am disabled and have issues communicating.  Dr Manoj put me at ease and examined me privately..He examined me under a blanket so I felt comfortable. I think. Hw is one. of the best doctor.

Dr. Padman was patient and a great listener. He also provided very useful advices and explained our patient’s situation clearly and confidently. We highly advice him for pediatric orthopedic matters in Delhi.
